BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent

Class CDMainContentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.MainContentController
      • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent.CDBottomRightController
        • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent.CDMainContentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingClicks

    public class CDMainContentController
extends CDBottomRightController
implements DrawingClicks
    This class controlls main content Panel. This class handles calling of mouse clicks and mouse movements. It will create and change objects on class diagram drawing panel. It also handles creating and joining objects on class diagram drawing pane. It handels creating of new usecases by calling right method from CDUseCaseConnector.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Field Detail

      • LeftBottomContent

        protected CDLeftBottomContent LeftBottomContent
        Panel which has buttons for changing join edges. It stores each button for changing style and type of join egdes.

      • LeftTopContent

        protected CDLeftTopContent LeftTopContent
        Panel which stores buttons for changing class type. If you want to create either class or interface this class has buttons for setting what you want to create.

      • useCaseConnector

        protected CDUseCaseConnector useCaseConnector
        Connector between class diagram and use case. When the class is being reconnected with use case, this connector is called.

      • useCaseReactivator

        protected CDUseCaseReactivator useCaseReactivator
        Reactivator between class diagram and use case. It stores methods for reactivating use cases and class diagrams together.

      • bottomRightContent

        protected BottomRightContentModel bottomRightContent
        Panel with buttons to reactivate or delete inactive objects. In here it is also stored adding new method or class variable.

      • attributesPanel

        protected ClassDiagramAttributesPanel attributesPanel
        Panel with text fields and buttons for inserting new attributes. In this panel is stored textfields and comboboxes for creating new class variable or new ethod.

      • leftContentModel

        protected BottomLeftContentModel leftContentModel
        Panel for saving methods and variables of class.

      • leftBottomController

        protected CDBottomLeftController leftBottomController
        controller for handeling deleting and managing of variables and methods of class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CDMainContentController

        public CDMainContentController(DiagramPlacesManager diagramPlaces,
                       BottomRightContentModel bottomRightContent,
                       ClassDiagramAttributesPanel attributesPanel,
                       BottomLeftContentModel leftContentModel)
        Basic constructor. It sends to his parent DiagramPlacesManager, BottomRightContentModel, ClassDiagramAttributesPanel and create new leftBottomController, set left content model to BottomLeftContentModel.
        Parameters:
        diagramPlaces - all places of diagram, this will be used in it's parrent.
        bottomRightContent - panel for handeling right part of class diagram.
        attributesPanel - leftPanel with adding new variables and methods.
        leftContentModel - model for setting bottom left model with reactivate buttons and additional content.

    • Method Detail

      • drawingMouseDragged

        public void drawingMouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e,
                       CoordinateModel dragged)
        When mouse is being dragged on drawing pane. This method will check for type of dragged object and change it's coordinates.
        Specified by:
        drawingMouseDragged in interface DrawingClicks
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent, storring where mouse is located and what is being done.
        dragged - CoordinateModel that is being dragged on drawing pane.

      • drawingPaneClicked

        public void drawingPaneClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt)
        This method is called when clicked on class diagram drawing. When mouse is clicked (pressed and released), this method will either create new object or select object.
        Specified by:
        drawingPaneClicked in interface DrawingClicks
        Parameters:
        evt - coordinates of clicked mouse.

      • drawingPanecheckMove

        public void drawingPanecheckMove(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt)
        This is called when mouse moves on class diagram drawing. It highlights objects when hover over them.
        Specified by:
        drawingPanecheckMove in interface DrawingClicks
        Parameters:
        evt - coordinates of mouse.

      • setSelectedObject

        public void setSelectedObject(CoordinateModel clickedObject)
        When object is selected in class diagram. This method will handle additional components to be shown based on type of selected class or if line is clicked.
        Specified by:
        setSelectedObject in interface DrawingClicks
        Parameters:
        clickedObject - selected object (CoordinateModel).

      • drawingPaneDoubleCliked

        public void drawingPaneDoubleCliked(CoordinateModel pressedObject)
        When object is double clicked on class diagram. This method will bring dialog for setting objects being double clicked.
        Specified by:
        drawingPaneDoubleCliked in interface DrawingClicks
        Parameters:
        pressedObject - double clicked object (CoordinateModel).

      • buttonsChanged

        public void buttonsChanged()
        When buttons are changed in class diagram. When buttons from left content are changed, fire this method. It will change style of join edge between classes.
        Specified by:
        buttonsChanged in interface DrawingClicks

      • drawJoinEdge

        public void drawJoinEdge(CoordinateModel clickedObject)
        Method for drawing join edge on class diagram. It checks if new line can be drawn. If both objects are set for join edge, add this new line to placeManager for class diagram.
        Parameters:
        clickedObject - clicked class, it will be stored either on first object or second object place for join edge.

        public void removeLineFromArrayListAndSetNewLine(CDJoinEdgeController joinEdge)

        joinEdge - CDJoinEdgeController join edge to be changed.
